title: German Meatballs
directions: soak rolls or bread in water and squeeze almost dry then break into pieces
melt 1 Tbsp butter in saucepan, add chopped onion and cook until translucent
place ground meats in a bowl, add cooled cooked onion, and the bread with salt and pepper to taste
add 1 egg yolk and mix everything together - can add broth if too thick
add spices and quartered onion to broth and heat to just under a boil
add the meatballs carefully and cook until done, about 12 minutes
melt 2 Tbsp butter in a pan, add flour to make a roux
stir in strained meatball broth to thin, add capers, white wine, lemon juice, sour cream and sugar if desired
add meatballs to the sauce and serve
ingredients: 2 small onions - 1 finely chopped and 1 quartered
